data.comment: The big names in today's match at London Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Stuart Attwell, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Callum Wilson (Newcastle) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Newcastle are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Newcastle push forward at London Stadium and Federico Fernandez gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the West Ham defence.
Stuart Attwell signals a West Ham throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 8, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
West Ham drive forward but Jarrod Bowen is judged offside.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
Free kick Newcastle.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 13, Isaac Hayden (Newcastle) has received a first yellow card.
Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham) powers in a header – against the bar!
Goal kick for Newcastle at London Stadium.
In the minute 15, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
In the minute 18, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle's Callum Wilson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle.
In the minute 23, In London Newcastle drive forward through Jonjo Shelvey. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Newcastle attack but Andy Carroll's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 25, Stuart Attwell awards West Ham a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
West Ham's Michail Antonio gets in a shot on goal at London Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Newcastle.
West Ham surge into the attack at London Stadium but Tomas Soucek’s header is off-target.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Tomas Soucek (West Ham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Jonjo Shelvey for Newcastle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Stuart Attwell awards West Ham a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Important block from the West Ham defence as Andy Carroll fires in a strike for Newcastle.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
West Ham push forward at London Stadium and Michail Antonio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
In the minute 34, In London West Ham attack through Pablo Fornals. The finish is off target, however.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Newcastle.
West Ham's Jarrod Bowen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Newcastle are pushing forward but Callum Wilson's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Newcastle's Andy Carroll has run offside.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, West Ham's Michail Antonio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Stuart Attwell signals a West Ham throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in West Ham.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Stuart Attwell has blown to start the second-half.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 51, Free kick West Ham.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of West Ham.
In the minute 54, Ryan Fredericks for West Ham has been booked by Stuart Attwell and receives a first yellow card.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Callum Wilson is on target to give Newcastle a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 56, Jeff Hendrick instrumental with a fine assist.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in high up the field for West Ham in London.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Newcastle needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Newcastle at London Stadium.
Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Newcastle at London Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, David Moyes (West Ham) is making a first substitution, with Sebastian Haller replacing Mark Noble.
Andriy Yarmolenko is replacing Pablo Fornals for West Ham at London Stadium.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to West Ham.
In London, Sebastian Haller of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to West Ham.
Javi Manquillo (Newcastle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 70, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
At London Stadium, Andriy Yarmolenko has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Newcastle's Allan Saint-Maximin breaks free at London Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle make their first substitution with Joelinton replacing Allan Saint-Maximin.
In the minute 77, Throw-in West Ham.
Joelinton (Newcastle) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 79, West Ham drive upfield and Andriy Yarmolenko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In London, Andriy Yarmolenko of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 81, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Stuart Attwell signals a West Ham throw-in in Newcastle's half.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 84, Sebastian Haller of West Ham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle.
The away team have replaced Callum Wilson with Miguel Almiron. This is the second substitution made today by Steve Bruce.
In the minute 86, Joelinton of Newcastle is pulled up for offside.
Goal! Newcastle extend their lead to 0-2 through Jeff Hendrick.
Great play from Miguel Almiron to set up the goal.
In the minute 88, Michail Antonio for West Ham is whistled offside.
Steve Bruce is making the team's third substitution at London Stadium with Sean Longstaff replacing Andy Carroll.
Felipe Anderson is replacing Jarrod Bowen for West Ham at London Stadium.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in London.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
West Ham's Andriy Yarmolenko is on target but unsuccessful.
Miguel Almiron (Newcastle) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Newcastle push upfield but Stuart Attwell quickly pulls them for offside.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
